name: Anurag Pallaprolu's Documentation
tagline: Useful cheatsheets and tutorial documents written down in Latex
body:
### Welcome to Anurag Pallaprolu's Document Center
Hi! Welcome to my documentation center. I am an avid LaTeX user and keep documenting interesting and useful things like cheat sheets etc. I keep them updated in my git repo, you can either download individual files or get my entire updated list everytime by git cloning.

I have currently completed a cheat sheet on complex analysis. Hope this helps.


### Authors and Contributors
Anurag Pallaprolu is a Physics and Electronics student at BITS Pilani, India. Interested in Theoretical Physics, Mathematics and Combinatorics. Pursuing Quantum Computing and a constant LaTeXer. [LinkedIn](http://in.linkedin.com/pub/anurag-pallaprolu/55/629/b59)

### Support or Contact
You can always reach me at anurag.pallaprolu@gmail.com or on my git repository which is updated almost everyday.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
